key-empty.title: Key empty
key-empty.description:
Check if the key is empty.

```toml
# VALID BUT DISCOURAGED
"" = true
```

key-not-allowed.title: Key not allowed
key-not-allowed.description: Check if the key is not defined in this Table.

key-pattern.title: Key pattern
key-pattern.description: Check if the key matches the pattern in the Schema.

dotted-keys-out-of-order.title: Dotted keys out of order
dotted-keys-out-of-order.description:
Check if dotted keys are defined out of order.

```toml
# VALID BUT DISCOURAGED
apple.type = "fruit"
orange.type = "fruit"
apple.skin = "thin"
orange.skin = "thick"

# RECOMMENDED
apple.type = "fruit"
apple.skin = "thin"
orange.type = "fruit"
orange.skin = "thick"
```

table-max-keys.title: Max keys
table-max-keys.description:
Check if the table has more than the maximum number of keys.

```rust
length(table) <= maximum
```

table-min-keys.title: Min keys
table-min-keys.description:
Check if the table has less than the minimum number of keys.

```rust
length(table) >= minimum
```

table-key-required.title: Key required
table-key-required.description: Check if the key is required in this Table.

type-mismatch.title: Type mismatch
type-mismatch.description: Check if the value is of the correct type.

const-value.title: Const value
const-value.description: Check if the value is equal to the const value.

enumerate.title: Enumerate
enumerate.description: Check if the value is one of the values in the enumerate.

deprecated.title: Deprecated
deprecated.description: Check if the value is deprecated.

float-maximum.title: Maximum float
float-maximum.description:
Check if the float is less than or equal to the maximum.

```rust
float <= maximum
```

float-minimum.title: Minimum float
float-minimum.description:
Check if the float is greater than or equal to the minimum.

```rust
float >= minimum
```

float-exclusive-maximum.title: Exclusive maximum float
float-exclusive-maximum.description:
Check if the float is less than the maximum.

```rust
float < maximum
```

float-exclusive-minimum.title: Exclusive minimum float
float-exclusive-minimum.description:
Check if the float is greater than the minimum.

```rust
float > minimum
```

float-multiple-of.title: Multiple of float
float-multiple-of.description:
Check if the float is a multiple of the value.

```rust
float % multiple_of == 0
```

disabled.title: Warn rule disabled
disabled.description: If `true`, Warn is disabled for this value.

disabled.title: Error rule disabled
disabled.description: If `true`, Error is disabled for this value.
